title: The Cliff Beasts Collection
description: Mankind is threatened with a new kind of beast. Catch up with the 23rd biggest action franchise ever and the five films that led up to the ill-fated Cliff Beasts 6: Battle for Everest: Memories of a Requiem.
altHero: Carol Cobb as Dr. Lacey Nightingale in front of a Chinese temple and flying dinosaur
